title: Pixel2 missing call when use LTE preferred
content:
I had good WCDMA signal and bad LTE signal at home,
and if I use LTE perferred, then I start missing calls and text messages

my carrier has no Volte support for pixel2 , but if in a few months ago, pixel 2 (and other phone) will automatically switch to 3G when got call

I can only use my pixel 2 if I set network to WCDMA perferred , and it's not good, please help.
